author: jawi
msg: ACE-435 - Content-Length not always set for deployment packages:
- when downloading a DP, the content length header was not always
set. The agent could therefore not determine a priori how many
- the solution is to leverage the ContentRangeResponseWrapper for
non-range requests as well, making it possible to exactly
determine the content length *before* sending it to the agent.
